description: This file defines a Python class HackerNewsTools that provides methods to fetch top stories and user details from Hacker News using the Hacker News API. It utilizes external libraries such as httpx for HTTP requests and includes logging for debugging.

classes.name: HackerNewsTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Hacker News API to retrieve top stories and user details.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the HackerNewsTools instance, setting up available tools based on provided flags.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from Hacker News and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: get_user_details
methods.description: Retrieves details of a Hacker News user given their username and returns as a JSON string.
